rows.label: tlk44310181_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Welcome to Teos Aure,
the Luxurian capital!

rows.label: tlk44310181_03_msg0002
rows.name:
The world's in turmoil, but my job
is the same: keeping the peace, and
guiding outlanders around.

rows.label: tlk44310181_03_msg0003
rows.name:
So, now. Are you tired? Go to
Anastatia's! Hungry? The shops at
Elmos Square will sort you out.
